outline:
1. guard, charge, function, obligation, service, watch
    1. guard, watch, house of detention or confinement
    2. keeping, preserving
    3. charge, injunction
    4. office, function (ceremonial)
kjv_def: charge, keep, or to be kept, office, ordinace, safeguard, ward, watch.
strongs_def: watch, i.e. the act (custody), or (concretely) the sentry, the post; objectively preservation, or (concretely) safe; figuratively observance, i.e. (abstractly) duty or (objectively) a usage or party
